ThingDef.label: tribal crib
ThingDef.description: A woven basket with a cloth or fur blanket to keep a baby warm. A high quality crib will make a baby happy. Multiple cribs can be placed in a bedroom without turning it into a barracks.

ThingDef.label: Retro armchair
ThingDef.description: A highly comfortable armchair that was banned from making jokes, however it sure feels cozy to sit on.

ThingDef.label: Rimtendo Console
ThingDef.description: Plays a selection of classic games on the totally non-copyright console "Rimtendo Entertainment System". Retro TV included.

ThingDef.label: Rock'em Sock'em
ThingDef.description: The ancient game of two robots beating each other to death against their will for your entertainment. No wonder Mechanoids hate us.

ThingDef.label: Dungeons and Randies
ThingDef.description: The ancient tabletop role-playing game. Toxic fallouts and plagues for everybody!

ThingDef.label: personal sofa
ThingDef.description: A sofa for your pawn to crash on. It's not as restful as regular bed, but it's very comfortable!

ThingDef.label: Fancy Sit Grand Throne
ThingDef.description: A large, ornate chair, designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.

ThingDef.label: Love Demand Grand Throne
ThingDef.description: A large, ornate chair, designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.

ThingDef.label: Spiky Flat Grand Throne
ThingDef.description: A large, ornate chair, designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.

ThingDef.label: Half chair throne
ThingDef.description: A chair designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.

ThingDef.label: Round Back throne
ThingDef.description: A chair designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.

ThingDef.label: Raid Stabber throne
ThingDef.description: A chair designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.

ThingDef.label: Army Tent
ThingDef.description: A bigger tent capable to sleep 4 peoples inside,but still have to be aware of dangerous wild.

ThingDef.label: Scrap Shelter
ThingDef.description: a simple shelter made by metals.

ThingDef.label: small animal sarcophagus
ThingDef.description: A small ornamented burial receptacle for the honored animals.

ThingDef.label: large animal sarcophagus
ThingDef.description: A large ornamented burial receptacle for the honored animals.

ThingDef.label: medical animal bed
ThingDef.description: A soft animal bed for surgery and recovery. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: weight bench
ThingDef.description: The weight bench is a place where you can train your muscles.

ThingDef.label: barbell
ThingDef.description: A barbell for strength training exercises.

ThingDef.label: pull up bars
ThingDef.description: Used for performing upper body exercises such as pull-ups and chin-ups to strengthen the back, arms, and core muscles.

ThingDef.label: balance beam
ThingDef.description: A narrow beam is with a long padded surface for athletes to perform balance and precision routines.

ThingDef.label: spinning dummy
ThingDef.description: A spinning dummy used in martial arts and combat sports for striking and grappling practice.

ThingDef.label: weight rack
ThingDef.description: A weight rack designed to organize and store weights, ensuring easy access and a clutter-free workout area.

ThingDef.label: treadmill
ThingDef.description: A indoor treadmill for cardiovascular fitness.

ThingDef.label: exercise bike
ThingDef.description: A stationary fitness machine resembling a bicycle, used for cardiovascular workouts by pedaling against resistance levels.

ThingDef.label: dumbbells
ThingDef.description: Free weights for a variety of exercises targeting different muscle groups.

ThingDef.label: jump rope
ThingDef.description: A jump rope for cardiovascular workouts and coordination training through rhythmic jumping.

ThingDef.label: kettlebell
ThingDef.description: A a cast-iron weight with a handle, used for dynamic strength and endurance exercises.

ThingDef.label: hand grips
ThingDef.description: Portable exercise tools designed to strengthen the muscles in the hands, wrists, and forearms.

ThingDef.label: exercise ball
ThingDef.description: An inflatable, resilient ball used for yoga and fitness exercises to improve balance, core strength, and flexibility.

ThingDef.label: gramophone
ThingDef.description: An ancient windup device utilized to play sound recordings from bygone eras.

ThingDef.label: radio
ThingDef.description: An ancient windup device utilized to play sound recordings from bygone eras. Now with autoplay.

ThingDef.label: piano
ThingDef.description: An acoustic, stringed musical instrument played using a keyboard. Can improve artistic skill and joy.

ThingDef.label: chandelier
ThingDef.description: A metal or stone ceiling mount for wax candles to light an area. Can be automatically refueled with wax made from animal fats at a cooking station. Produces a very small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: royal chandelier
ThingDef.description: A lavish metal or stone ceiling mount for wax candles to light an area. Can be automatically refueled with wax made from animal fats at a cooking station. Produces a very small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: candelabra
ThingDef.description: A metal mount for wax candles to light an area. Can be automatically refueled with wax. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: gas street lamp
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that uses preinstalled gas pipes to fuel an automatic flame.

ThingDef.label: gas street lamp
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that uses preinstalled gas pipes to fuel an automatic flame.

ThingDef.label: gas street lamp glower
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that uses preinstalled gas pipes to fuel an automatic flame.

ThingDef.label: gas lamp
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that uses an inner gas mantle with preinstalled gas pipes to create incandescent light.

ThingDef.label: Tesla arc lamp
ThingDef.description: The earliest form of electric lighting, a lamp that produces light through an arc between carbon rods.

ThingDef.label: Edison lamp
ThingDef.description: Tungsten-filament lamp that lights a small area. While not as bright as an arc lamp, it provides a warm glow.

ThingDef.label: Edison tube
ThingDef.description: Tungsten-filament tube that lights a small area encased with a small metal cage. While not as bright as an arc lamp, it provides a warm glow.

ThingDef.label: fancy telescope
ThingDef.description: A fancy telescope for doing amateur astronomy. It's a relaxing and fun hobby for a certain kind of person.

ThingDef.label: wood stove furnace
ThingDef.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Runs out of fuel after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.

ThingDef.label: Refrigerator
ThingDef.description: Meals stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: telegraph
ThingDef.description: The telegraph allows communication with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.

ThingDef.label: square plant pot
ThingDef.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: plant spot
ThingDef.description: A large flat pot for decorative flowers. Easier to build but not quite as pretty as a pot.

ThingDef.label: ornate plant pot
ThingDef.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby. This plant pot has some artwork carved into it.

ThingDef.label: ornate square plant pot
ThingDef.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby. This plant pot has some artwork carved into it.

ThingDef.Name: Anon2TableBase
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.Name: Anon2TableQualitySurfaceBase
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: Counter
ThingDef.description: An Counter, has a large flat top.

ThingDef.label: Counter Full
ThingDef.description: An Counter, has a large flat top. All Counter top, useful for those front walls.

ThingDef.label: square dining chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table.

ThingDef.label: cushioned chair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation and dining.

ThingDef.label: computer chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable chair with ajustable hight and support. Favored by those who use computers.

ThingDef.label: couch right
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch center
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch left
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch corner
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch corner Inverted
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: file cabinet
ThingDef.description: An organizational tool often used for keeping records in old fashion paper form.

ThingDef.label: Sink
ThingDef.description: Where you should clean your hands.

ThingDef.label: end table (lamp)
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort slightly. Includes a lamp.

ThingDef.label: royal end table (lamp)
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a royal bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort. Includes a lamp.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (magenta) - LEGACY
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in magenta.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (yellow) - LEGACY
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in yellow.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (orange) - LEGACY
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in orange.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (purple) - LEGACY
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in purple.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (aqua) - LEGACY
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in aqua.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (lime) - LEGACY
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in lime.

ThingDef.label: dresser
ThingDef.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort slightly.

ThingDef.label: end table
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort slightly.

ThingDef.label: royal end table
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a royal bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort.

ThingDef.label: mounted muffalo head
ThingDef.description: A dead muffalo head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted caribou head
ThingDef.description: A dead caribou head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted cougar head
ThingDef.description: A dead cougar head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted deer head
ThingDef.description: A dead deer head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted dromedary head
ThingDef.description: A dead dromedary head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted elephant head
ThingDef.description: A dead elephant head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted elk head
ThingDef.description: A dead elk head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted gazelle head
ThingDef.description: A dead gazelle head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted grizzly bear head
ThingDef.description: A dead grizzly bear head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted ibex head
ThingDef.description: A dead ibex head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted lynx head
ThingDef.description: A dead lynx head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted megasloth head
ThingDef.description: A dead megasloth head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted panther head
ThingDef.description: A dead panther head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted polar bear head
ThingDef.description: A dead polar bear head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted rhino head
ThingDef.description: A dead rhino head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: mounted thrumbo head
ThingDef.description: A dead thrumbo head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: taxidermist table
ThingDef.description: A workbench for performing taxidermy.

ThingDef.label: mounted basilisk head
ThingDef.description: A dead basilisk head on a piece of wood to mount on a wall.

ThingDef.label: FEERSTELL fireplace
ThingDef.description: FEERSTELL fireplace Can be built instead of a wall, but works best with a sealed cimney behind that routes the heat from the backside back through a vent

ThingDef.label: LAMPON Lamp
ThingDef.description: LAMPON Lamp Lights strung on fabric. Not very bright but sure pretty.

ThingDef.label: KAGESHAIN Lamp
ThingDef.description: KAGESHAIN Lamp There have not been many KAGESHAIN lamps produced. It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.

ThingDef.label: KAGESHAIN Lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: KAGESHAIN Lamp in rad-red. There have not been many KAGESHAIN lamps produced. It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.

ThingDef.label: KAGESHAIN Lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: KAGESHAIN Lamp in mean-green. There have not been many KAGESHAIN lamps produced. It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.

ThingDef.label: KAGESHAIN Lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: KAGESHAIN Lamp in true-blue. There have not been many KAGESHAIN lamps produced. It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.

ThingDef.label: KAGESHAIN Lamp (violet)
ThingDef.description: KAGESHAIN Lamp in skylit-violet. There have not been many KAGESHAIN lamps produced. It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.

ThingDef.label: KAGESHAIN Lamp (yellow)
ThingDef.description: KAGESHAIN Lamp in mellow-yellow. There have not been many KAGESHAIN lamps produced. It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.

ThingDef.label: PILFUR bed
ThingDef.description: PILFUR bed Why sleep on the floor when you can sleep on a comfy pile of stuff

ThingDef.label: WODEN Table
ThingDef.description: WODEN Table It's a table. It's made of wood. It's old and rickety and not much to look at, but it will hold your food off the floor. Probably.

ThingDef.label: BULDREST Stool
ThingDef.description: BULDREST Stool Someone thought that stacked stonechunks are better for sitting on than nothing. They were right.

ThingDef.label: REGSIT Stool
ThingDef.description: REGSIT Stool A piece of leather and some steel - et voil! An ingenious way of sitting, invented by the Galga Ler on Achron V.

ThingDef.label: SITTSLAB chair
ThingDef.description: SITTSLAB chair Whoever said that stone is not comfortable? Prove everyone wrong with this replica of a perfectly comfortable stony chair.

ThingDef.label: STAMMREST Chair
ThingDef.description: STAMMREST Chair The STAMMREST is an authentic chair, fashioned after those found in the ruins of the Red Tree People on Xentis Ham.

ThingDef.label: PILREKLIN Couch
ThingDef.description: PILREKLIN Couch Recline comfortably on this carefully arranged pile of leather and fabric.

ThingDef.label: BUTTEKUSH Pillow
ThingDef.description: BUTTEKUSH Pillow Rest your tushie on this plushy cushion!

ThingDef.label: STAMMFLATT Table
ThingDef.description: STAMMFLATT Table The STAMMFLATT is a table, skillfully crafted from logs, that goes perfectly with our STAMMREST chair.

ThingDef.label: SLABFLATT Table
ThingDef.description: SLABFLATT Table This splendidly designed stone table is the perfect center-piece for any dining room!

ThingDef.label: KRUDNEPP Single bed
ThingDef.description: KRUDNEPP Single bed Take a nap on the KRUDNEPP! It may look a bit rickety, but don't worry, it is perfectly safe to sleep on!* (*for one person. RIMkea is not liable for any and all injuries sustained while using our furniture. --RIMkea, Legal Dept.)

ThingDef.label: SLABNEPP Double bed
ThingDef.description: SLABNEPP Double bed This hand-crafted stone bed, showing an intricate pattern known as "Billa-of-the-Crag Knot", is as beautiful as it is comfortable (fits two people).

ThingDef.label: SNORHOI animal bed
ThingDef.description: SNORHOI animal bed "All your animals need, is your love, a bit of kibble, and a SNORHOI."* - Great Philosopher** (*loosely translated; **Anonymous)

ThingDef.label: BOLTASK Lamp
ThingDef.description: BOLTASK Lamp A bright and warm little fire, perfectly contained in a bowl.* (*don't leave fire unattended.)

ThingDef.label: KAROMUF sculpture
ThingDef.description: KAROMUF sculpture The holy KAROMUFF is a creature worshiped by the Cheda of the Indigo Gerbil Tribe on Alioth Posterius.

ThingDef.label: SMOERTIGE sculpture
ThingDef.description: SMOERTIGE sculpture This stunning statue is a likeness of "Anha the Graceful" a matriarch of the Gray People Tribe known to be a dazzling and exquisite beauty.

ThingDef.label: LORDOKI sculpture
ThingDef.description: LORDOKI sculpture This statue depicts the wolf-like god named "LORDOKI", worshiped by the Purple Lobster Crouca on Aldhafera XI

ThingDef.label: BLUMTASK plant pot
ThingDef.description: BLUMTASK plant pot Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.

ThingDef.label: FLIKFUT Rug
ThingDef.description: FLIKFUT Rug Five pieces of leather, fit together into a beautifully savage-looking rug to decorate your home with!

ThingDef.label: MATIPESSI Rug
ThingDef.description: MATIPESSI Rug A charming little rug in the style of the Abeneiro of Llama Tribe.

ThingDef.label: MISKANTAA Rug
ThingDef.description: MISKANTAA Rug This piece of art, in the form of a rug, shows a marvelous design used by the Caxigo Braga people on Achrid I.

ThingDef.label: HOISTEP Rug
ThingDef.description: HOISTEP Rug Give your home that "barnyard feel" with this artfully arranged collection of hay.

ThingDef.label: RUGUN rug
ThingDef.description: Rug from the "RIMkea Cozy Rugs Collection" 3x3

ThingDef.label: RUGDWA rug
ThingDef.description: Rug from the "RIMkea Cozy Rugs Collection" 4x4

ThingDef.label: RUGTRE rug
ThingDef.description: Rug from the "RIMkea Cozy Rugs Collection" 3x3

ThingDef.label: RUGFIR rug
ThingDef.description: Rug from the "RIMkea Cozy Rugs Collection" 2x2

ThingDef.label: BUMREST Stool
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - BUMREST stool The perfect resting place for all kinds of bums.

ThingDef.label: SITEGG Armchair
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SITEGG armchair Feel like a chick - sit in an egg.

ThingDef.label: CHILLEGG Couch
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - CHILLEGG couch Go back in time and follow the ancient terran custom of "Netflix and chill" (the definition of/instructions for "Netflix and chill" can be found in historical texts describing the ancient social structures of Terra. --RIMkea, History Dept.)

ThingDef.label: EATFLATT Table
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - EATFLATT table No better place to eat or gather than at a pretty, flat surface! The EATFLATT Table - for all your flat surface needs!

ThingDef.label: PETSNORR animal bed
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - PETSNORR animal bed Rest and treat your furry friends comfortably on the RIMkea PETSNORR. Pethair repellent and easy to clean.

ThingDef.label: SNOREGG Single bed
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SNOREGG Single Bed Feeling single and lonesome? - No problem! The SNOREGG Single bed hugs you comfortably in your sleep, and you will feel alone no more!

ThingDef.label: SNOREGG Double bed
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SNOREGG Double Bed A cozy sleeping "egg" for resting and lovin'. (Please be advised, "lovin'" is only possible with two people. Partner not included. -- RIMkea, Legal Dept.)

ThingDef.label: SHAINBRAIT Lamp
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SHAINBRAIT lamp in brite-white. Illuminate! For the night is dark and full of terrors!

ThingDef.label: SHAINBRAIT Lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SHAINBRAIT lamp in rad-red. Illuminate! For the night is dark and full of terrors!

ThingDef.label: SHAINBRAIT Lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SHAINBRAIT lamp in mean-green. Illuminate! For the night is dark and full of terrors!

ThingDef.label: SHAINBRAIT Lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SHAINBRAIT lamp in true-blue. Illuminate! For the night is dark and full of terrors!

ThingDef.label: SHAINBRAIT Lamp (violet)
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SHAINBRAIT lamp in skylit-violet. Illuminate! For the night is dark and full of terrors!

ThingDef.label: SHAINBRAIT Lamp (yellow)
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - SHAINBRAIT lamp in mellow-yellow. Illuminate! For the night is dark and full of terrors!

ThingDef.label: POTBLUM plant pot
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - POTBLUM plant pot Roses are red, violets are blue, we love our POTBLUM, and so will you!

ThingDef.label: FUTSTENT Rug
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - FUTSTENT Rug This rug was made for walking and that's what you should do! Don't hesitate and feel the luxurious comfort all over you (-r feet)

ThingDef.label: STEPFUT Rug
ThingDef.description: Millenium Line - STEPFUT Rug Step unto the STEPFUT rug and find your path to luxury! Brightens all sleeping quarters and improves every common room.
